name: BEERSKPONG
description:
Keep Louie behind the bar. A trashgame created for the #BeerSK jam.

Designed for 2 players:

  • Player 1: A - left, S - right.
  • Player 2: K - up, L - down.

Creators:

  • Alayna Cole. alaynamcole.itch.io
  • Ben Rolfe. ecoludology.itch.io
  • Dakoda Barker. jirogames.itch.io
